column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////It takes 40 minutes for them to make the pizza. We ordered the Chicago classic which was delicious. It's not going to blow your mind
column2: so don't have sky high expectations when you come here. The small was more than enough food for the 2 of us
column3: so don't order more than that because the portions are large and you're going to end up with a lot of leftovers
